description: Ralph autonomous improvement engine - loop control and plan archival hooks
notes: Activation-gated design: Hooks do NOTHING unless Ralph was started (/ralph:start).
Bash wrappers check for $PROJECT/.claude/ralph-state.json with state:running
If not active, wrappers exit silently without invoking Python/uv (zero overhead).
This prevents broken .venv issues and unnecessary processing in non-Ralph projects.
